comment: @Ukie_g8 @Adamw_Burch I work very closely with many Priests and none of them have been told to not give last rites. Do not push lies and calumny
@FiatLuxGenesis @Adamw_Burch I'm sorry to hear of your trouble. I pray you find a priest who will help you work this out.
@Adamw_Burch It is true. Happened to me. Can't get my child baptized by a priest. Protestants will do it, but Catholics won't.
@Adamw_Burch @bithits It seems it depends on the bishop. In the Seattle Archdiocese, the sacraments continue to the extent possible under the state directives.
